author: Alex Mackay
method: Arrange the pear slices on a serving plate and scatter over the orange zest.  Combine the cream cheese and chopped lemon verbena leaves in a bowl. Place a slice of tomato on top of the pear and top with a spoonful of the cream cheese mixture. Repeat with the remaining tomato and cheese, alternating the layers. Garnish with the chives and serve.
ingredients: ½ pear, cored, thinly sliced on a mandoline,  ½ orange, zest only,  3 tbsp cream cheese,  1 tbsp chopped lemon verbena leaves,  1 tomato, sliced,  fresh chives, to garnish
